short_description: Upgraded Stepless Dimming - Our matte black table lamps have a smooth-turning dimmer switch, allowing easy brightness adjustment from high to low, including direct lamp turn-off. This thoughtful design provides added safety, making our lamps for bedroom perfect for households with children or pets Dual Fast USB Charging Ports - Our bedside table lamp features upgraded USB-C and USB-A charging port (5V/2.1A), enabling convenient and rapid simultaneous charging of electronic devices. Whether the lamp is on or off, you can effortlessly charge your mobile phones, iPads, Kindles, headsets, diffusers, speakers, and other electronics with ease Includes 2 Free Dimmable LED Bulbs - Our industrial desk lamp is equipped with two T45 dimmable LED Vintage Bulbs. With an impressive lifespan of over 25000 hours and a 90% energy-saving feature, they provide flicker-free and non-dazzling illumination, ensuring optimal eye protection 60-Month Warranty - We have full confidence in the quality of our products, which is why we offer an extensive 60-month warranty. Should you encounter any issues with our table lamp for bedroom, please don't hesitate to contact us via the Amazon message box, and we will respond promptly within 24 hours
